sourcesContent:
<template>
    
        <vxe-form
          title-colon
          ref="xForm"
          title-align="right"
          title-width="100"
          :data="demo2.formData2"
        >
          <vxe-form-gather span="28">
            <vxe-form-item title="姓 名" field="name" span="24" ></vxe-form-item> 
            <vxe-form-item title="工 号" field="userId" span="24" ></vxe-form-item>
            
          </vxe-form-gather>
        </vxe-form>
</template>

 <script>
import { defineComponent,ref,reactive } from 'vue';
import{getworkerMessage} from '../../api/api.js'


  export default defineComponent({
    setup  () {
      let getid = localStorage.getItem("Userid");
      getworkerMessage(getid).then(
       response =>{
         if (response['code'] == 1){
        // demo2.formData2.name = response['data'].name
        // demo2.formData2.userId = response['data'].userId

         demo2 = reactive({
        formData2: {
          name: response['data'].name,
          userId: response['data'].userId,
        },
      })

         }
       })

    return {
       demo2
    }}
    })
    </script>
